post.title: QOTD – Norman Guadagno
post.content:
Actually, this quote is from Tuesday – I’m just way behind on blogging.

“The benefit of being despised is that you have carte blanche. They can’t hate me any more than they already do.” – Norman Guadagno
post.excerpt: Actually, this quote is from Tuesday – I’m just way behind on blogging. “The benefit of being despised is that you have carte blanche. They can’t hate me any more than they already do.” – Norman Guadagno

comments.name: Norman Guadagno
comments.content: And, yes, it does apply to me.
